body.p: Divvun - Spellchecker for North Sámi and Lule Sámi. Press the above link.
Risten - Wordbank (term lists) and grammar. Press the above link.
Etymological database at the Finnish Centre for Domestic Languages
E-skuvla Learn North Sámi and South Sámi (paysite).
